value:
$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I will do what I can to help you... I'll
do anything, no matter how small.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|You haven't the strength to help
me, Eir.$k$pSoon, they will be here. And against
them, you stand no chance.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Mother, I...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|If you would die, then die. Another
road is open before you, however...
You could join the living.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|What? Why?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Join their army. Obey them, body and
soul. Give yourself to them
completely.$k$pOnce you earn their trust...you can
slaughter them at my command.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|I do not care if you do not like my
order. You will obey.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yes, Mother.$k$p

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|You're from Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|And you?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I am Eir... Princess of the realm of the
dead.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So you're part of Hel's army, then.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yes, but... I...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You what?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|The outcome of this fight doesn't
matter to me. Who wins, who loses...
Let us begin.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I have lost. You may kill me...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|You won't do it. Why not?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I can't take the life of an opponent
who surrenders it freely.$k$pAnd there are things I would like to
ask you...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|So I am to be your prisoner?
Very well.$k$p

$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Shall we get going, Alfonse? His
Majesty is waiting.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes, Mother.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Sharena, you come too, but please...
don't disrupt the conversation.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You can count on my silence! Father
is quite something when he's angry.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Good luck, you two.$k$pLet's find somewhere to wait,
$Nu.$k$pWe have to figure out something to
do with her.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I would join your fight.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Join us? Though you fought on the
side of Hel?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I did, yes. But now that I have made
my escape, I am no longer princess.
I cannot return.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Tell me why!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I am afraid I must keep that to
myself...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I don't believe that for a second! If
you can't trust us, how can we
trust you?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I know how this sounds. It must seem
so selfish of me to ask so much of
you...$k$pStill, though, I wish to join you.$k$pIf you ever find cause to distrust me...
kill me then and there.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I certainly can't trust you! But you
must know something about Hel's
forces. That's valuable to me.$k$pJust so we're clear—I'll take you up
on your offer. The second I have
cause to suspect you...that's it.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|That's all right.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's a strange one, isn't she?
I don't sense she holds any animosity
toward us. She's...apathetic.$k$p$EFace|Hey, $Nu...
Keep an eye on her.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Do what you must,
$Nu.$k$p$Sbs150|
